tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Kirghiz Boy with Falcon", 1953.
1953. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-223.
